name: grass production, Swiss integrated production, intensive | grass, Swiss integrated production | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/7325/documentation

This dataset represents the production of 1 kg of grass (dry matter). The dry matter yield is 13500 kg/ha. Moisture content at harvest is 85%.;;[This dataset was already contained in the ecoinvent database version 2. It was not individually updated during the transfer to ecoinvent version 3. Life Cycle Impact Assessment results may still have changed, as they are affected by changes in the supply chain, i.e. in other datasets. This dataset was generated following the ecoinvent quality guidelines for version 2. It may have been subject to central changes described in the ecoinvent version 3 change report (http://www.ecoinvent.org/database/ecoinvent-version-3/reports-of-changes/), and the results of the central updates were reviewed extensively. The changes added e.g. consistent water flows and other information throughout the database. The documentation of this dataset can be found in the ecoinvent reports of version 2, which are still available via the ecoinvent website. The change report linked above covers all central changes that were made during the conversion process.]

This activity assumes grass production on a temporary meadow during three years (2-3 years in regions with high arable use, 3-4 years in regions with low arable use) and represents an average of the three years; it starts with the soil cultivation and sowing after the harvest of the previous crop. The inputs of seeds, mineral fertilisers and pesticides are considered. Farm manure as an organic fertiliser is only accounted for in terms of direct field emissions; all pre-processes are included in the animal production systems.


The dataset includes all machine operations and corresponding machine infrastructure and sheds. Machine operations are: soil cultivation, weed control (pesticides against Rumex), sowing, fertilisation, mowing and loading for transport. This activity ends after loading of the grass at the farm gate.
category: A:Agriculture, forestry and fishing/01:Crop and animal production, hunting and related service activities/011:Growing of non-perennial crops/0119:Growing of other non-perennial crops

processDocumentation.geographyDescription: Refers to a production in the Swiss plateau (lowlands <700m).
processDocumentation.samplingDescription: Data were compiled from statistics, fertilising recommendations, documents from extension services and expert knowledge.

exchanges.description: Net yield of 13'500 kg DM/(year*ha) (experts estimate R. Tschachtli, LBBZ, 2005).

Yearly application of mineral fertilizer as for hay on permanent meadow in Nemecek et al. (2004)
This exchange has an activity link directly to the producing activity because the product is primarily consumed in the same geographical area where it is produced.

Total amount of active substance/s of fertilisers needed for the production of 'grass, Swiss integrated production' is calculated to be circa 2.22E-03 kg. Fertiliser/s used in this dataset is/are: 'ammonium nitrate, as N'. The total amount of active substance/s is doubled in order to account for the packaging of the dilluted product of fertiliser/s that is/are applied. Therefore, 4.44E-03 kg of packaging for fertilisers is justified with this exchange.

exchanges.description: Total amount of active substance/s of pesticides needed for the production of grass, Swiss integrated production is calculated to be circa 1.23E-04 kg. Pesticide/s used in this dataset is/are: 'phenoxy-compound'. The total amount of active substance/s is doubled in order to account for the packaging of the dilluted product of pesticide/s that is/are applied. Therefore, 2.47E-04 kg of packaging for pesticides is justified with this exchange.

This exchange has an activity link directly to the producing activity because the product is primarily consumed in the same geographical area where it is produced.
